title: uNDO ivvulaginil
sahitya:
uNDo ivvulaginil unakkiNaiyAna tuNai paNDArat-tirukkOlam koNDirukkum vElavA


anupallavi

  aNDam anaittilum avadippaTTu uzhalum anbaraik-kAttavar tunbam tIrttiDavE


caraNam    tiNDADat-tIvinai uNDAkkum vEdanai daNDAyudanE unnai kaNDAl uDan ODumE 
koNDADik-kUDi daNDaniDum toNDar paN pADi vENDiDum pazhani ANDavanE
